InsightIQ Admin Guide¶

This guide describes how to configure and manage InsightIQ.

This guide is task-based and structured with a chapter for each page in the InsightIQ application.

Contents:

  • Where to go for support
    • Support for IsilonSD Edge
  • Summary Page
    • Changing the Summary View
    • Sorting the current view
    • Filtering the current view
    • Opening Cluster Details
  • Cluster Details page
